pr_title: Adding @hide annotation to cleanly document FIS SDK.

timeline.message: Dropping guava and appcompat dependency from FIS SDK.
Adding @hide annotation to cleanly document FIS SDK.

timeline.bodyText: @vkryachko Should the class members also be public to be documented on firebase site?
timeline.author: ankitaj224

replies.bodyText: Yes, and since this is an interface, all of its methods are public. Also note my other comment on this interface, I don't think it should be documented
replies.author: vkryachko

timeline.author: diwu-arete
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -57,6 +57,8 @@ *
  • provide auth token of a Firebase installation *
  • provide a API to GDPR-delete a Firebase installation * + * + * @hide

timeline.message: Updating the api.txt as per the API review.
